topic.title: Adding a Class to a Protocol

para.text: Adding a Class to a Protocol
It is easy to find where such automatically generated methods have been added into the image by browsing the "not yet implemented" pseudo-category from within the Class Browser or System Browser.
Note that, if a class conforms to a protocol, then so must all of its subclasses. This is why the
pane is actually a list of individual class hierarchies.
